author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قد انتهت الظّهورات الی هذا الظّهور الأعظم کذلک ینصحکم ربّکم العلیم الحکیم و الحمد للّه ربّ العالمین
translation: Verily I say, in this most mighty Revelation, all the Dispensations of the past have attained their highest, their final consummation. Thus counseleth you your Lord, the All-Knowing, the All-Wise. Praise be to God, the Lord of all worlds.
